caller_intent: Brandy from Alliance Insurance is seeking clarification on billing discrepancies after a policy change and wants to set up auto-pay for a client (Debbie Belleville) to ensure consistent monthly payments.
resolution_steps: Agent Kayla confirmed the account number and policyholder name.
Kayla checked the account for endorsements and confirmed a $718.30 adjustment was applied.
Explained that the billing discrepancy would resolve itself once a payment plan change request was processed.
Confirmed no pending endorsements and assured the client the future billing would stabilize for auto-pay setup.
knowledge_required: Understanding of policy endorsements and their impact on billing
systems_referenced: Penn National Insurance customer contact center system
summary: Brandy from Alliance Insurance consulted Kayla about billing irregularities after a policy change for Debbie Belleville. Kayla confirmed a $718.30 endorsement adjustment was applied and explained that processing a payment plan change would resolve the billing inconsistency, enabling auto-pay setup. The call concluded with Kayla assuring Brandy the billing would stabilize.
